mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (p_name, p_code, p_category, p_unit, p_price, stock, s_id, p_description, p_status) VALUES (#{pName}, #{pCode}, #{pCategory}, #{pUnit}, #{pPrice}, #{stock}, #{sId}, #{pDescription}, #{pStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_code, p.p_category, p.p_unit, p.p_price, p.stock, p.s_id, s.s_name, p.p_description, p.p_status FROM product p LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.s_id = s.s_id WHERE p.p_id = #{value}
